description:
Automotive News Mobile offers real time access to 12 automotive industry news & video feeds. Also customize your app through "my feeds" news & information from other sources. App is free to download & $0.75/week for subscribers and $1.90/week for non-subscribers of Auto News publications. Try it for free through Dec. 31.

These feeds include:
	Breaking news from Automotive News 7 days per week
	Articles and columns from both the print and online versions of Automotive News
	Monthly U.S. Sales data updated at the beginning of each month
	Specifications for every new vehicle sold in the U.S.
	Calendars of auto shows, dealer events, and other upcoming auto industry events
	Streaming video including the First Shift morning and ANTV afternoon newscasts
